title: I can't remember my username with no E-mail attached.
body:
Trying to login to my smurf account after not having played for a long time and I can't remember the username for it. I had made it pretty randomly, and its a level 30 GP one trick account.

I know the password and the ign itself if that helps in anyway.

Is there anything I can do? I took a long break and forgot to attach an e-mail to the account so I can't recover it.

replies.body: If you don't know the email that's attached to that smurf account, or simply never had one attached, you should reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) by picking "I need help recovering my account". They should be able to help you back into that smurf after verifying that you were the account creator.
